device_mount: Handheld; Placed loosely around user (e.g., table)
evaluation: User study (qualitative); User study (quantitative, controlled lab experiment)
contribution_desc: Using multiple phones for collaborative brainstorming. Covers the actual system and simple interaction techniques.
interaction_techniques: Creating content; Pinching for connecting views; picking up device for 'edit' mode
crossdevice_def: Use "social and spatial interactions platform" as description of general area.
